message: Hi Bob, I have an amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $200, which is a significant discount from my initial offer. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate the discount, but $200 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $180?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $220. Is that something you'd be willing to go for?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $200?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $225, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $220?
I've already given you a good deal, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $225. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm not sure we'll be able to come to an agreement.
I understand you're not willing to go lower, but I'm still not comfortable with $225. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $220?
